@JHenderson Brilliant, skipper ❤️

Therefore I dedicate this to all the nurses, doctors, carers, porters, admin workers, cleaners, security personnel and every single individual who devotes their career and their lives to making the NHS the part of British life we are rightly most proud of as a nation. #ImHonoured
Huge numbers of football fans, from across the country, also displayed great generosity in donating. But the true heroes are the NHS staff; they put themselves in harm’s way to serve and protect us.
...rather than the reason for it. The other Premier League captains were the catalyst and the rest of the players, including my own teammates at Liverpool, were a driving force behind the scenes.

NHS Charities Together is as big a privilege as any. It’s important for me to state that although the honour has been issued to me personally, the credit must be shared to a far larger group of people and I accept this in the knowledge I was part of something special...

My family and I feel greatly humbled to be recognised by my award of an MBE, more so given the reason for it. There are many privileges that come from playing professional football, but having a platform to promote a charitable cause such as Players Together and... https://t.co/po2mWuQxSQ

“I’ll dedicate this definitely to them [NHS staff and volunteers] because they put their lives at risk to help the nation.” ❤️

#LFCU23s completed an excellent Academy double today by beating @Arsenal U23s 4-0 in #PL2 🙌🔴

GOAL! WOODBURN!

Brilliant play on the edge of the box, quick passing from the Reds and Woodburn is played in. He controls and finishes low to net the young Reds' fourth.

[4-0] | #LIVARS

GOAL! CAIN AGAIN!

A low left-footed effort from Cain gives the young Reds the perfect start to the second half. That's his second and #LFCU23s' third goal of the afternoon.

[3-0] | #LIVARS

A good half from #LFCU23s, with tidy finishes from Stewart and Cain meaning the young Reds lead 2-0 at the break.

#LIVARS

GOAL! CAIN!

Lovely skill on the edge of the area and a composed finish into the top corner. Superb play.

[2-0] | #LIVARS

GOAL! STEWART!

Layton Stewart picks the ball up inside the box, lets the ball run across him and curls the ball into the bottom corner. Brilliant finish.

[1-0] | #LIVARS
